segments.text: Well , I'm glad you're finally back . I was wondering what happened .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel kind of stupid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We got lost coming back . I guess I don't really know this town yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You got lost . You're kidding !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . We took a wrong turn somewhere.And Joseph doesn't know the town at all . So I started giving him directions.But I didn't really know where we were . So we got seriously lost .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You could have called .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know I could have . But finally we asked someone where we were .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You've been gone for two hours . How could you get lost for so long ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Guess where we ended up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . Where ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When we finally decided to ask someone , they told us we were in Grangerfield .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Grangerfield ! You were in Grangerfield ? That's a completely different town ! How could you drive to a completely different town ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know.The person we asked had to give us directions to the highway to get back here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Grangerfield is like a dozen miles away from here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know it is . I don't know how it happened .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm , maybe I do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe I have an idea how it happened .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You were too busy looking at Joseph , and you weren't paying attention to the road .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's what you think , huh ?
segments.speaker: S2
